bolt11.description: the bolt11 string (always present unless **bolt12** is)

bolt12.description: the bolt12 string instead of **bolt11** (**experimental-offers** only)

payment_hash.description: the hash of the *payment_preimage* which will prove payment

amount_msat.description: The amount of the invoice (if it has one)

status.description: Whether it has been paid, or can no longer be paid

expires_at.description: UNIX timestamp of when invoice expires (or expired)

created_index.description: 1-based index indicating order this invoice was created in

pay_index.description: Incrementing id for when this was paid (**status** *paid* only)

paid_at.description: UNIX timestamp of when invoice was paid (**status** *paid* only)

paid_outpoint.description: Outpoint this invoice was paid with (**status** *paid* only)

txid.description: ID of the transaction that paid the invoice (**status** *paid* only)

outnum.description: The 0-based output number of the transaction that paid the invoice (**status** *paid* only)

payment_preimage.description: the proof of payment: SHA256 of this **payment_hash**

local_offer_id.description: the *id* of our offer which created this invoice (**experimental-offers** only).

invreq_payer_note.description: the optional *invreq_payer_note* from invoice_request which created this invoice (**experimental-offers** only).
